DOC.brief_summary: IOP is measured with two devices (Dynamic Contour Tonometry (DCT) and Goldmann applanation tonometry (GAT)).
DOC.detailed_description: DCT reading will be compared to a corrected GAT reading by the formula of Elsheikh, Alhasso and Pye. - Trial with medical device
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: clinical diagnosis of glaucoma Exclusion criteria: other optic neuropathy other then glaucoma age<18 corneal surgery use of contact lenses
